content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position (x)
Consists of steam engine (position x1), boiler (position y1), and offshore pump (position z1).

### Copper plate mine at position (x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position x1) and a furnace at position (y1)
- Burner mining drill (position x2) and a furnace at position (y2)
- Burner mining drill (position x3) and a furnace at position (y3)

### Copper cable factory at position (x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine at position (z1) and inserter at position (a) that puts into the assembling machine
- Beltgroup (position b) that connects the furnace at position y1 to the assembling machine at position (z1)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting to place it.

### Errors related to crafting limitations
- Check your inventory and available resources before attempting to craft items to avoid errors related to insufficient materials.
